  • Uses of BadInputException in com.apj.projects.leetcode4j.datatypes.utils

    Methods in com.apj.projects.leetcode4j.datatypes.utils that throw BadInputException
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int[]
    LeetcodeInputTransformer.transformTo1DIntArray()
    Transforms the input string to int array. ( NOTE: The input string must start with '[' and should end with ']' with numbers seperated by a comma ',' eg - [1, 2, 3] )
    String[]
    LeetcodeInputTransformer.transformTo1DStringArray()
    Transforms the input string to String array. ( NOTE: The input string must start with '[' and should end with ']' with string seperated by a comma ',' eg - [hello, world, !]
    TreeNode
    LeetcodeInputTransformer.transformToIntegerBST()
    Transforms the input int array to Binary Search Tree ( NOTE: The input string must start with '[' and should end with ']' with string seperated by a comma ',' eg - [hello, world, !]
    ListNode
    LeetcodeInputTransformer.transformToIntLinkedList()
    Transforms the input int array to Linked list ( NOTE: The input string must start with '[' and should end with ']' with string seperated by a comma ',' eg - [hello, world, !]
